myProjects.title: UkExress
myProjects.technologies: React TypeScript ReduxToolkit Supabase ReactHookForm TailwindCSS
myProjects.description: UkExpress is an e-commerce web app. Build on front-end development with Vite. The products are fetched and cached with Redux Toolkit Query from dummyjson.com API. Authentication is implemented via Supabase API.

myProjects.title: DevGuide
myProjects.description: NoteBook is a web app for taking digital notes. Features a form with inputs for the title and the content. A list with the taken notes is displayed below.

myProjects.title: HelioStorm
myProjects.description: HelioStorm is a simple weather web app fetching data from the Open Weather Map API with the help of Axios. Features a city search bar and a weather details component below.
